section.section: A person shall obtain a permit from the Commission before the person may make a hookup with a water or sewer service line that the Commission constructs or maintains.
A hookup shall be made under the conditions that the Commission authorizes.

text.section:
To prevent or eliminate leakage, loss of water, the unnecessary use of sewers, or other waste of water, the Commission may:
at a reasonable time, enter a building or premises that has a connection with the water supply or sewer system under the jurisdiction of the Commission; and
issue an order requiring a change in the plumbing, waterworks, or water or sewer connection that the Commission considers necessary.
